attributes.action: Scrap the Police and Crime Commissioner Scheme.
attributes.additional_details: Recent activity has proved that these HUGELY OVERPAID individuals are nothing more than party political activists, particularly those Commissioners who are members of the Labour Party who cannot control their overtly RED activities and the scheme does NOTHING more than increase the cost of government for taxpayers.  The people NEVER wanted these people, ergo the monumentally low election turnout, and they MUST now be removed as a HUGE failure.
